QuestData.Title: No Sister Left Behind
QuestData.Description: We were searching the ruins south of here when the mogu fell upon us out of nowhere.$b$BSome of us were able to retreat to this encampment but many others were captured. The mogu have also caught a number of the Horde who happened to be in the area as well.$b$bPlease, $p, rescue any sentinels that you can.$b$bLeave the Dawnchasers to their fate.
QuestData.CompletionText: I will not have my people condemned to slavery and torture at hands of the mogu.
QuestData.RewardText: There are so few of us, it is a great relief to see such help.
